item.description:
From Johnny D's:

Greetings!
In an effort to help in any way we can, Johnny D's is organizing "Rising - Songs Of Hope & Recovery" a benefit for the victims of the tragic Boston Marathon bombings. Tickets here.
Please plan on attending this very special event on Tue 5/14 at 7:00. We'll update you on all the performers as the growing list continues to grow! Many Boston singer/songwriters and bands are signing on so this will be a revolving stage of great acts jumping up to do a couple of songs. We'll have loads of raffle prizes from very generous businesses too. Tickets will go onsale this Friday at 9am. Proceeds will benefit The One Fund. You can donate here: http://onefundboston.org.
The Johnny D's extended family wish to express our heartfelt condolences to everyone that lost loved ones and friends and to let the injured know we're pulling for your recoveries. Stay strong Boston!

 

 

 

Tickets should be obtained here($15 + service fee):

http://www.ticketweb.com/t3/sale/SaleEventDetail?dispatch=loadSelectionData&eventId=3546134&pl=jds

I have obtained a General Admission ticket. They have table seating available, but I won't be going that route. You certainly welcome to obtain tables if bringing a group.
item.how_to_find_us: I have a meetup button/will email my cell phone #
item.name: Rising-Songs of Hope and Recovery 5/14 at 6:45 pm Johnny D's
